update MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION
SUBSCRIPTION_NUMBER=#{subscriptionNumber},
PRODUCT_ID=#{productId},
BASE_REGION_ID=#{baseRegionId},
BUY_TYPE=#{buyType},
CHARGE_TYPE=#{chargeType},
ORDER_TIME=#{orderTime},
VALID=#{valid},
START_TIME=#{startTime},
END_TIME=#{endTime},
USER_ID=#{userId},
DELETED=#{deleted},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime},
UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser},
DESCN=#{descn},
PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=#{productInfoRecordId}
where ID=#{id}

update MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION subscription left join MATRIX_PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD record on subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=record.ID set subscription.VALID=0 where record.INSTANCE_ID=#{instanceId}
mapper.select:
select
from MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION subscription left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on subscription.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID left join MATRIX_PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD record on subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=record.ID
and record.INSTANCE_ID is not null and mbo.STATUS=2
and subscription.START_TIME < #{date} and subscription.END_TIME >= #{date}

select ,record.PARAMS,record.PRODUCT_ID,record.INVOKE_TYPE, record.ID RECORD_ID,record.INSTANCE_ID,product.NAME PRODUCT_NAME, region.NAME BASE_REGION_NAME from MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION subscription left join MATRIX_PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD record on subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=record.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on subscription.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_BASE_REGION region on subscription.BASE_REGION_ID=region.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on subscription.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT mbs.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID, MAX(mbs.END_TIME) AS MaxDate FROM MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION mbs left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on mbs.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID where mbo.STATUS=2 GROUP BY PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID ) tm ON subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID = tm.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID AND subscription.END_TIME = tm.MaxDate
and record.INSTANCE_ID is not null and mbo.STATUS=2

select
from MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION subscription where subscription.ID = #{subscriptionId}

select count(1) from MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION subscription left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on subscription.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_BASE_REGION region on subscription.BASE_REGION_ID=region.ID left join MATRIX_PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD record on subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=record.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on subscription.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT mbs.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID, MAX(mbs.END_TIME) AS MaxDate FROM MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION mbs left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on mbs.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID where mbo.STATUS=2 GROUP BY PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID ) tm ON subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID = tm.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID AND subscription.END_TIME = tm.MaxDate
and record.INSTANCE_ID is not null and mbo.STATUS=2
and product.NAME like CONCAT('%','${productName}','%') escape '^'
and region.NAME like CONCAT('%','${baseRegionName}','%') escape '^'

select , record.ID RECORD_ID,record.INSTANCE_ID,record.CREATE_TIME RECORD_CREATE_TIME, product.NAME PRODUCT_NAME,DATEDIFF(subscription.END_TIME, NOW()) AS DATE_NUM, region.NAME BASE_REGION_NAME from MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION subscription left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on subscription.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_BASE_REGION region on subscription.BASE_REGION_ID=region.ID left join MATRIX_PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD record on subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=record.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on subscription.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT mbs.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID, MAX(mbs.END_TIME) AS MaxDate FROM MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION mbs left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB mbos on mbs.ID=mbos.SUBSCRIPTION_ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER mbo on mbo.ID=mbos.ORDER_ID where mbo.STATUS=2 GROUP BY PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID ) tm ON subscription.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID = tm.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID AND subscription.END_TIME = tm.MaxDate
and record.INSTANCE_ID is not null and mbo.STATUS=2
and product.NAME like CONCAT('%','${productName}','%') escape '^'
and region.NAME like CONCAT('%','${baseRegionName}','%') escape '^'
ORDER BY subscription.END_TIME
limit #{page.startRowPosition},#{page.recordsPerPage}
